Recipe.title: Mud Punch
Recipe.Description: I have no idea why, but at a family gathering with cousins, my dad just decided to mix a couple of juices. The results looked disgusting, but actually tasted really good. Because of the brown color, we decided to call it "Mud Punch".

section.instruction: In a large pitcher, combine both cans of Juice Concentrate.
Add the appropriate amount of water. (2 cans for each.)

Notes.note: These days, the coloring of the Juice Concentrates is generally artificial, so it doesn't look like mud so much, but it still tastes good.
